alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 10:07PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Otero, western Kiowa and southeastern Crowley Counties through 1045 PM MDT... At 1006 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sugar City, or 18 miles north of La Junta, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ordway and Sugar City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
